Title: Independence Day
Writer: Greg Weisman, Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Jerry Siegel (character created by: Superman), Joe Shuster (character created by: Superman), William Moulton Marston (character created by: Wonder Woman), Joe Samachson (character created by: Martian Manhunter)
Actors: Jesse McCartney, Khary Payton, Jason Spisak, Rene Auberjonois
Plot: Three teenage sidekicks decide to investigate a fire at a genetics laboratory... and discover a plot to create a clone of Superman.
